attributes.action: Not build any more nuclear power plants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have barely scratched the surface with other types of non Carbon Dioxide emitting energy. 

Britain could be the worlds leader in solar panels if we start researching and building them now - think of al the jobs this could create.

Nuclear power is dangerous and the government has barely thought about other types of power. Britain has the most area in Europe for off shore wind farms yet is lagging behind other countries, like Germany, who have many more off shore wind farms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
